sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz';
import Button from '../button.js';
import FlexContainer from '../flex-container';
import FlexItem from '../flex-item';

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"button"}}>{`Button`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Button`}</MDXTag>{` component represents a button.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"variants"}}>{`Variants`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You style can be controller by the property `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`variant`}</MDXTag>{`:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"primary"}}>{`Primary`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer>
  <FlexItem width="100%" desktop={{width: '150px'}}>
    <Button variant="primary">Primary</Button>
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"default"}}>{`Default`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer>
  <FlexItem  width="100%" desktop={{width: '150px'}}>
    <Button>Primary</Button>
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"disabled"}}>{`Disabled`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This option turn the button on it's disabled form :`}</MDXTag>
<FlexContainer>
  <FlexItem width="100%" desktop={{width: '150px'}}>
    <Button variant="default" disabled={true} onClick={f => f}>I am a disabled button</Button>
  </FlexItem>
</FlexContainer>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"playground"}}>{`Playground`}</MDXTag>
